title: Coleen Rooney claims she caught fellow WAG Rebekah Vardy giving fake stories to tabloids
text:
Coleen Rooney has claimed to have caught fellow football WAG Rebekah Vardy leaking fake stories about her to a tabloid newspaper.

During a five-month investigation, during which time she shared false private information about her family to a select few people on Instagram only for the stories to end up in The Sun, Mrs Rooney claims to have snared the snitch.

Rooney claimed she worked out it was Mrs Vardy, the wife of Leicester City and England striker Jamie Vardy, following a process of elimination which led to her sharing certain stories with only her.

In a sensational statement posted on Twitter, Mrs Rooney wrote: "For a few years now someone who I trusted to follow me on my personal Instagram account has been consistently informing The SUN newspaper of my private posts and stories.

"There has been so much information given to them about me, my friends and my family - all without my permission or knowledge.

"After a long time of trying to figure out who it could be, for various reasons, I had a suspicion."

Rooney, 33, said she "came up with an idea" to try to prove her theory that it was Vardy, and that she blocked everyone apart from her from seeing her Instagram stories.
description: Coleen Rooney has claimed to have caught fellow football WAG Rebekah Vardy leaking fake stories about her to a tabloid newspaper.
